programme.title: Weird Or What?...
programme.desc: Amazing Survival: Incredible stories of people who cheated death, including a man who escaped from the avalanche of debris caused by the collapse of the World Trade Center.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: The Tesla Experiment. Giorgio A Tsoukalos draws on evidence from past series as he asks whether Nikola Tesla was communicating with extraterrestrials. (S1, ep 3)

programme.desc: Alien Power Plants: Giorgio Tsoukalos draws on evidence from past series as he asks whether aliens introduced the Greeks and Egyptians to electricity. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Series following life in a huge Detroit pawn shop. Staff fight over whether to buy a load of venomous reptiles, and an incident forces Les to seek a new head of security.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Series following life in a huge Detroit pawn shop. Les tells a frightening story of a stick-up at his grandpa's store, and a dominatrix brings her gear into the shop.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Malaysian Toilet Monster & The Buzzer: A large black creature emerging from a family's toilet could be some kind of mythical creature. An astronaut spots something intriguing. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Solar Spaceship and Invisibility Cloak: Could a breed of dogs have the power to freeze time? Do invisibility cloaks really exist? The team examine the videos and reach a verdict. (S2, ep 6)

programme.desc: Oozing Talent: When Sugar unwittingly wins a job as spokesperson for a diarrhoea medication, she enlists the help of her friends to stop the commercial from premiering during the big game. (S3 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Senior Sinisters: Harold concocts an anti-age cream for Chef, but when it turns the kids old Chef decides to hide the reversal cream - taking care of old people is making him young again! (S3 Ep47)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Be Claws I Love You, Shelley: When Owen brings a lobster in for show and tell, we discover that Chef has a real lobster problem. (S3 Ep48)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Trauma Rama: Duncan, normally the bad kid, has an identity crisis when his pranks start curing people of their fears. (S3 Ep49)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Doomed Ballooned Marooned: After over-decorating a birthday table with balloons, several kids float away to a deserted island. (S3 Ep50)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Legends of the Paul: Duncan is jealous of Paul's 100-year time out and, determined to be King of the Pranks, has to team up with Paul, learn his ways and double-cross him to become a legend. (S3 Ep51)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Bridgette Too Far: As season three draws to a close, Bridgette becomes desperate to star in an episode. (S3 Ep52)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: As Far as Bear Can Remember: An old metal box found by chance brings back childhood memories for Grizzy and the Lemmings. They recall the first time they met, when they were still kids. (S1 Ep55)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Chemical Lemmings: How can Grizzy watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box? (S1 Ep56)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Remote Control: Grizzy's TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. (S1 Ep57)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear and the Butterfly: Grizzy wants to offer a butterfly to the she-bear he's in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens he's spotted. (S1 Ep58)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Get Off My Tennis Shoes: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight! (S1 Ep59)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Babysitting: Grizzy babysits for the bear he has a crush on. There's no question of Grizzy tripping up, for he has no intention of taking any risks! (S1 Ep60)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Lock and Key: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the ranger's brand new and apparently burglar-proof safe. (S1 Ep61)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Blues: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. (S1 Ep62)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Snow Lemmings: Grizzy craves ice cream on a hot day, but the Lemmings have used strawberry-vanilla ice cream to create a sled run in the backyard. (S1 Ep63)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Dancing with the Bears: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear he's in love with. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Role Change: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks he's a rodent! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Tonic: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau

programme.title: Twm Twrch

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Diolch i dechnoleg estron, mae Joni'n dysgu bod angen mwy na doniau'n unig ar archarwr. Thanks to alien technology, Joni learns that a superhero needs more than just talent.

programme.title: Blociau Rhif

programme.title: Cywion Bach

programme.title: Pablo

programme.title: Caru Canu

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar, gyda chysgodion yn dawnsio a robotiaid yn chwarae! Join Jam on a musical journey, full of interesting sounds and pictures!

programme.title: Fferm Fach

programme.title: Guto Gwningen

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae'r gadwyn wedi torri ar feic Harri - lwcus mai i weithdy trwsio beics mae o'n mynd heddiw. The chain on Harri's bike has broken - lucky that he is going to a bike repair workshop today.

programme.title: Byd Rwtsh Dai Potsh
programme.desc: Mae Dai am ddysgu sut i chwarae drymiau, ond mae wedi cael recordydd yn lle hynny. Mae o eisiau cystadlu yn nghystadleuaeth gerdd yr ysgol. Dave wants to learn to play the drums at school!

programme.title: Bwystfil
programme.desc: Os yn fach neu'n fawr, yn fflwfflyd neu'n ffyrnig, mae rhaid i anifeilaid fwyta er mwyn goroesi. Yn y rhaglen yma, ni'n cwrdd a 10 anifail llwglyd. We meet 10 of the hungriest animals.

programme.title: LEGO Ffrindiau: Amdani Ferched!
programme.desc: Pan mae murlun Emma'n cael ei fandaleiddio,dilyn y merched y troseddwr a darganfod lle arbennig iawn, Ty Ffrindiau. When Emma's mural gets spray painted, the girls go after the culprit.

programme.title: Rhyfeddodau Chwilengoch
programme.desc: Animeiddiad am ferch cyffredin sy'n byw bywyd cyffredin - ond mae hefyd ganddi bwerau siwper-arwres! An ordinary girl, living an ordinary life... but she also has super powers!

programme.title: Y Sn
programme.desc: Awn i un o syrcasau cyfoes mwyaf Ewrop gyda Trystan Chambers, a chawn gip ar waith yr argraffwr Elin Crowley. We're at the Celtic Deaf Festival and see glass-work at Swansea School of Art.

programme.title: The Dark
programme.desc: 1979. Sci-fi Horror. Directed by John 'Bud' Cardos & Tobe Hooper. Stars William Devane & Cathy Lee Crosby. An unlikely pair are drawn together when attempting to track down a vicious alien terror. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro prepares to lock up for the night but not before giving us a sneaky peek at next week's horrifyingly terrific films. [S]

programme.title: Warp Speed
programme.desc: 1980. Sci-Fi. A beautiful psychic is dispatched to investigate a space shuttle when its crew mysteriously disappears. Starring Adam West and Camille Mitchell. [S]

programme.title: The Avenging Hand
programme.desc: 1936. Drama. Directed by Frank Richardson. Stars: Noah Beery, Louis Borel, Kathleen Kelly. An old match seller is murdered but it's left to an American gangster to find the killer. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life A Dog's Life
programme.desc: 1960. A film looking at London from a dog's point of view, from the family pet to the pampered pooch.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Home for Christmas. 1962. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Irene Ryan & Donna Douglas. Jed, Elly May, Jethro and Granny take their first airplane flight back home for Christmas to pay cousin Pearl a visit. [S]

programme.title: Amos Burke: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Terror in a Tiny Town: Part 2. A mad right-wing judge who wants to take over the country, airs subliminal radio messages to control the minds of the locals.

programme.title: The Gilded Cage
programme.desc: 1955. Directed by John Gilling and starring Alex Nicol. Two brothers are embroiled in a racket to smuggle a valuable painting. When a murder is committed they must try and clear their names. [S]

programme.title: Talking Pictures Meets Ray Dorset
programme.desc: At the TPTV Festival in Christchurch, Mike Read is joined by Ray Dorset - guitarist, singer, songwriter and founder of Mungo Jerry, for an exclusive interview and some tunes to sing along to. [S]

programme.title: You Pay Your Money
programme.desc: 1957. Crime Drama. A rogue smuggler enters a murky world when his wife is kidnapped. Directed by Maclean Rogers. Starring Hugh McDermott, Jane Hylton and Honor Blackman. [S]

programme.title: Model For Murder
programme.desc: 1959. Drama. Directed by Terry Bishop. Stars Keith Andes, Hazel Court, Michael Gough, Julia Arnall & Patricia Jessel. A Mayfair dress designer arranges for the theft of valuable jewellery. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life In Good Shape
programme.desc: 1962. A focus on modern design in Britain, with a look at some of the recent exhibits at the Design Centre.

programme.title: Landfall
programme.desc: 1949. War. Director: Ken Annakin. Stars Michael Denison, Patricia Plunkett & Kathleen Harrison. At Coastal Command in Southern England, an RAF pilot is suspended after sinking a British sub. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Loneliness. 1974. Stars Richard Easton, Hilary Tindall & Rio Fanning. Brian and Ann both face the problems of loneliness. Meanwhile, the Hammonds are invited to Sir Neville's for a shooting party. [S]

programme.title: The Capture
programme.desc: 1950. Western. Directed by John Sturges. Stars Lew Ayres & Teresa Wright. An oil worker kills a suspected robber, setting off a downward spiral of events when he discovers the man was innocent. [S]

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: The Gunfighter. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Dick Kallman & John Pickard. When Bill stops a trail boss from harassing a saloon girl, the humiliated boss uses an eager young man to get his revenge. [S]

programme.title: Do You Know This Voice?
programme.desc: 1964. Drama. Directed by Frank Nesbitt. Stars Dan Duryea, Isa Miranda, Gwen Watford & Peter Madden. In this great murder mystery, the only clue to the killer's identity is his shoes! [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: The Frighteners. 1976. Stars James Ellis, Douglas Fielding, Paul Stewart, Ronald Radd & Judy Matheson. An ex-villain is entitled to police protection like anyone else - isn't he? [S]

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: Machine. 1970. Stars Alfred Lynch, Tony Beckley & Alethea Charlton. A Gestapo agent in the metalworks terrorises Jimmy into revealing his identity - and an innocent Polish worker is executed. [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Murder in a Vegetable Garden. 1999. Stars Bruno Cremer, Genevive Fontanel & Michle Simonnet. Maigret investigates the death of a homeless man, who was discovered at dawn in the shed of a garden. [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Peter the Lett. 1963. Stars Rupert Davies, Marius Goring & Peter Illing. An alarming piece of news makes its way to Maigret - one of the most dangerous criminals in Europe is now in Paris! [S]

programme.title: High Tide
programme.desc: 1980. Thriller. A man just released from prison for manslaughter heads to the West Country to solve the mystery behind his victim's cryptic last words. Stars Ian McShane, Wendy Morgan & John Bird. [S]

programme.title: High Tide
programme.desc: 1980. Thriller. A man just released from prison for manslaughter heads to the West Country to solve the mystery behind his victim's cryptic last words. Stars Ian McShane, Wendy Morgan & John Bird. [S]

programme.title: Lulu Belle
programme.desc: 1948. Musical Drama. Lulu Belle (Dorothy Lamour), a small-time singer and voracious man-eater with a sordid past, sings in a cheap dive in Natchez, Mississippi, in the early 1900s.

programme.title: Stranger From Venus
programme.desc: 1954. Sci-fi. Directed by Burt Balaban. A beautifully-crafted tale. A woman (Patricia Neal) meets a man (Dantine) from Venus with no pulse to warn Earth about the atom. Also starring Derek Bond. [S]

programme.title: The Rogues
programme.desc: 1965. Gig Young, David Niven and Charles Boyer are The Rogues, members of two related families of international forgers and conmen. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the Winthrop Legend. 1954. Starring: Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. The Winthrop family legend foretells the death of anyone who finds silver coins. [S]

programme.title: The Last Journey (1935)
programme.desc: 1935. Drama. Director: Bernard Vorhaus. Bob (Julien Mitchell) is distraught with his upcoming forced retirement and believes his wife is having an affair. The day arrives for his final journey. [S]

programme.title: Where There's A Will (1955)
programme.desc: 1955. Comedy. Director: Vernon Sewell. A cockney family inherit a ramshackle farm. Alfie (Leslie Dwyer) wants to make a go of it. Starring George Cole and Kathleen Harrison. [S]

programme.title: The Secret Man
programme.desc: 1958. Thriller. Director: Ronald Kinnoch. Stars Marshall Thompson, John Loder & Henry Oscar. A physicist finds himself drawn into an investigation to track down a spy at his research station. [S]

programme.title: Jassy
programme.desc: 1947. Drama. Director: Bernard Knowles. Stars Margaret Lockwood, Patricia Roc & Dennis Price. In the 17th century, Jassy is believed to be a witch after receiving visions of approaching disasters. [S]

programme.title: The Bulldog Breed
programme.desc: 1960. Comedy. Director Robert Asher. Stars Norman Wisdom, Edward Chapman, Terence Alexander, David Lodge. Norman Puckle joins the Navy under the same Admiral he refused to yield to in the harbour. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: A Message to Ireland - Part 1. 1973. Stars Mervyn Jones, Jonathan Elsom & Billy Hamon. Author and lecturer Arthur Charles Parfitt is accused of encouraging two young soldiers to desert the army. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: A Message to Ireland - Part 2. 1973. Stars Victor Maddern & Murray Hayne. Dugdale maintains that Parfitt was the reason for his and Fisk's desertion, and Ronald Fisk's father takes the stand. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: A Message to Ireland - Part 3. 1973. Stars Mervyn Johns & Betty Alberge. Arthur defends 'Trespass Under Arms' and denies any part in the troops going AWOL - but will this be enough to save him? [S]

programme.title: Inner Sanctum
programme.desc: 1948. Thriller. Director: Lew Landers. Stars Charles Russell, Mary Beth Hughes & Dale Belding. A man fleeing the police after having committed a murder hides in a boarding house in a small town. [S]

programme.title: So Long at the Fair
programme.desc: 1950. Mystery. Directors: Antony Darnborough & Terence Fisher. Stars Jean Simmons & Dirk Bogarde. Two siblings visit Paris for the Great Exhibition of 1889 when one of them goes missing. [S]

programme.title: The Cheaters
programme.desc: The Legacy. 1961. Stars John Ireland & Peter Butterworth. After suffering from three heart attacks George Connel schemes with a fellow conman to get some cash to leave behind for his relatives. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: When Will You Pay Me? 1976. Stars Colin Baker, Patrick O'Connell & Jean Anderson. Paul considers it high time Edward resumed his responsibilities as Managing Director and enlists Bill's help. [S]

programme.title: Travelling Man
programme.desc: Grasser. 1984. Stars Leigh Lawson, Paul Chapman & Cathy Hytner. A bullet smashes through the window of Lomax's barge, believing someone is out to get him he seeks out the shooter. [S]

programme.title: The Gold Robbers
programme.desc: The Arrangement. 1969. Stars Peter Vaughan, Maria Aitken & Peter Copley. With another chance to get on the robber's trail, Cradock wades deeper into the slimy and devious depths of the underworld. [S]

programme.title: The Glass
programme.desc: Episode 5. 2001. Stars Joe McFadden, Sarah Lancashire & John Thaw. Duggan's new company is thriving. Proctor has no idea about Carol's infidelities and tries to prove he is worthy of her love. [S]

programme.title: At The Earth's Core
programme.desc: 1976. Adventure. Directed by Kevin Connor. Stars Doug McClure, Peter Cushing, Caroline Munro & Cy Grant. A Victorian Scientist miscalculates his new machine and ends up in the Earth's core. [S]

programme.title: Petronix Defenders

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: The Great Sled Race: The four dinos are getting ready for their Shortest Day celebration, when they bring a sled filled with presents to the Frozen Land for a party with all the dinos. (S2 Ep46)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Big Brother, Big Sister: Tiny's little sister comes along, and Trey spends a great deal of time playing with her, and not much time with Tiny. (S2 Ep47)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Bill's Nose Knows: Bill is known throughout Cretacia for having the best sniffer in town. He can smell a flower before it has even sprouted through the ground! (S2 Ep48)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Dinos to the Moon: It's a big day for Mazu - she's built a rocket to fly to the moon with her three best friends! (And Rugo, who stows away.) (S2 Ep16)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Tall in the Saddle Drive: When a Brontosaur Leader gets separated from her herd, Dino Ranchers need to keep the herd from scattering until she can reunite with them and lead the migration. (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: Mighty Express Shorts
programme.desc: Birthday Express: Nico is disappointed when he thinks Max and Liza forgot his birthday. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Lights Out Zing: A storm knocks out the power in Cherry Town, and Zing is afraid of the dark! Can Explorer Kitty help her get over her fear, and turn the lighthouse on in time? (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Front Page Frido: Everyone in Cherry Town is working together to set the record for baking the biggest cupcake ever! But all Frido wants is to be on the front page of the paper. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Hicc-up Staged: The Beaver Triplets are getting ready to take the stage for a big performance when a bad case of the hiccups gets in the way of their dance moves! (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Dino Ranch

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Wild Wild Thunderfoot: When the Tinhorns trap Thunderfoot through dumb luck, the Dino Ranchers need to set the wild spinosaurus free before the Tinhorns get themselves in real trouble. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
